profile.name: Su Yechun (xieyezi)
profile.title: Senior Frontend Engineer/Architect | 7 Years Experience | Male | 29 Years Old | Chongqing

parsec.company: Parsec Technology Co., Ltd. (Senior Frontend Engineer | Remote)
responsibilitiesItems: Developed Pietra Creator Admin, Pietra Landing Page (Official Website)
Developed Pietra AI Copilot, Sourcing AI Agent and other AI tools
Developed internal technical plugins and tools (such as Pietra Devtool) to improve team DX
engineeringItems: Developed @pietra-auto-tracker plugin for seamless page tracking, improving data collection efficiency
Developed @pietra/auto-import plugin for automatic import of components, icons, and utility libraries, reducing manual import code
Built frontend monitoring system using @elastic/apm-rum, improving error capture rate and reducing online issue response time
architectureItems: Refactored official website to Next.js with SSR server-side rendering + ISR incremental static generation, reducing first screen load time and improving SEO traffic
Bundle optimization: Tree-shaking + dynamic imports, production bundle reduced by 67% compared to original
Google score improvement: Optimized LCP, FCP, CLS metrics, Search Console score improved from 40→90+

responsibilitiesItems: SDK API development for various automotive product lines within the company (SDK API)
Upgraded legacy project frontend architecture to new architecture and resolved historical issues
Developed Incall CLI, updated team development paradigm, improved team development efficiency
Responsible for frontend development technical interviews and Code Review
architectureItems: Comprehensively upgraded project architecture to monorepo (achieving componentized on-demand loading of business components)

Upgraded vehicle control SDK to micro-application framework, supporting remote self-update and seamless upgrade of micro-applications, integrated into multiple host APPs such as Changan Automobile, UNI, Kaicheng, etc. (greatly reducing main package size)
Comprehensively upgraded team technology stack, Webpack5/Vite + Vue2.7/Vue3, developed a series of engineering plugins (such as VSCode, ESLint, Prettier plugins, etc.), greatly improving team DX

Performed extremely detailed performance optimization on projects, such as refactoring Webpack configuration items according to functional programming, custom Webpack Loader, and optimizing entry volume with CDN
teamBuildingItems: Built team technical specification documentation center, unified team development standards
Organized internal technical sharing to improve team technical level
Represented the company at technical exchange meetings, sharing technical experience

javascript.title: Frontend development using Javascript (ES6) / TypeScript, proficient in the following frameworks
items: React state management: Zustand / Jotai / Redux
React component libraries: Radix UI / Ant Design
React common libraries: React Query / Formik

css.title: Proficient in CSS3 and related tools
items: Solutions: CSS Module / Styled Components / Emotion

build.title: Master common frontend engineering and build tools
items: Experience using Webpack / Vite for web application bundling and corresponding frontend performance optimization.
Master the process of using Rollup for component library bundling and publishing.
Prettier / ESLint for managing coding style standards.

git.title: Proficient in Git for version control and code hosting, familiar with Git flow

advantages.title: Advantages
items: Contributor to multiple large open source projects (Vant, Semi-Design, Vue, etc.)
Proficient in various frontend frameworks (React, Nextjs, TanStack Start, Vue, etc.)
Served as frontend architect and frontend technical leader, leading team technical architecture and performance optimization, self-developed team frontend scaffolding

metadata.title: Su Yechun (xieyezi) - Frontend Engineer | Resume
metadata.description: Resume of Su Yechun (xieyezi), focusing on frontend development with rich experience in frontend technology stack including React, Next.js, TypeScript and other modern frontend technologies.
